page.title: 07KIRKBURTON LIBRARY
page.content: The library in Kirkburton has been open since 1947. They have at least 30 different sections of books. The section of books that is in demand most by adults is fiction. The section of books that is in demand most by children is non fiction.Their supply of books come from Huddersfield. The library have approximately 8000 books. Katherine Cookson's books are the most popular in Kirkburton library. Their busiest times of the day are 2.30 to 3.00 on a Friday. Approximately two half thousand people come to the library. The children can be any age before they join the library club. The library is open four days a week , Monday , Wednesday , Thursday and Friday.
